thread.title: What a great hotel to feel like your really in Paris
thread.title_full: What a great hotel to feel like your really in Paris - Review of Le Dokhan’s, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: bowen00
title: What a great hotel to feel like your really in Paris
text: From the minute I arrived I felt warmly welcomed in this charming hotel. The staff is absolutely wonderful and knowledgeable of the hotel and surrounding area. An evening in the champagne room is a must with a cheese tray and please take the staffs reccomendations on local places to dine Quiet comfortable and hospitable .... We will be returning
